articles.title: Most powerful passports of 2024: Singapore takes top spot; check where India and Pakistan rank - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The latest Henley passport index for 2024 suggests, Singapore holds the title of the world's most powerful passport, providing visa-free access to 195 countries, while Indian passport holders can travel to 58 countries visa-free. Here's the list of the 10 mos…
articles.content: The Henley Passport Index released its 2024 list of the world's most powerful passports as of July 2024. The index ranks 199 countries worldwide according to the number of countries their citizens ar… [+2289 chars]
